subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miami lost the All-Star second baseman Dee Gordon to a dislocated left thumb on Saturday, and they responded with a franchise-record offensive outburst, beating the visiting Cincinnati Reds, 14-3.
snippet: Miami lost the All-Star second baseman Dee Gordon to a dislocated left thumb on Saturday, and they responded with a franchise-record offensive outburst, beating the visiting Cincinnati Reds, 14-3.
